# Raging Rubble (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Earth Spells|earth]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Bard Spells|Bard 3]], [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]], [[3rd Level Druid Spells|Druid 3]], [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Witch Spells|Witch 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Druid Spells List|Druid 5]], [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 round

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Effect:** One swarm of stones

**Duration:** Concentration + 2 rounds

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** Yes

**Source:** Advanced Race Guide, pg. 149

You animate an area of rubble, gravel, or other small stones, creating a dangerous, rolling area of debris. The animated rubble has a space of 10 feet and acts like a swarm, damaging (1d6 hit points) and distracting (DC 12) anything within it. As a move action, you can direct the rubble to move up to 10 feet. If the rubble is attacked, treat it as a Medium animated object with the young creature simple template and the [[S3.3 - Creature Subtypes (Bestiary 6 Apx)|swarm subtype]].
